summary: Diff implements a new translucent header utility class and applies it to Landing and several dashboard pages, updates Landing hero headline to a two-line version, and introduces new login button components using the existing Internet Identity hook. However, the diff also includes multiple unrelated UI/theme/routing/page changes that were not requested, and it’s not fully evidenced that *all* “Masuk” login triggers across the app were fixed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reduce the Landing page hero headline font size so each sentence fits on a single line on typical mobile/desktop widths (no unintended wrapping beyond the explicit line break).
missing_requirements.reason:
The headline is updated to two lines via an explicit
, but the shown classes remain relatively large (text-3xl md:text-4xl lg:text-5xl). The diff does not show additional measures (e.g., smaller sizes, max-width tuning, balance) to ensure the second sentence does not wrap on typical mobile widths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix all "Masuk" / login buttons across the app so they correctly trigger the Internet Identity (II) login flow, and ensure login buttons handle logging-in state (disabled/loading) to prevent double-click issues.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a new MasukButton used on Landing and an updated AuthButton with disabled state during logging-in, but it does not provide evidence that every other login control across the app (any other "Masuk" buttons/links) was replaced/wired to the II login flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/token overhaul (calm teal OKLCH palette) beyond the requested header translucency styling.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to unify translucent white headers and adjust one hero headline; it does not request a global color/theme redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: New route/page for partner application (/bergabung-menjadi-partner) and related UI changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicit constraint: keep existing app routes intact; non-goal: no redesign/new pages beyond header styling and hero headline change.
Not requested by any requirement; outside scope of header styling, hero headline copy, and login triggers.

hallucinated_features.description: RoleRouter and role-based routing behavior changes (new redirects/guards/loading/error styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains keeping existing app routes and role-based routing behavior intact; diff summary indicates routing component changes beyond just fixing login triggers.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-only role management UI and references to "three new backend functions" (addAdmin/removeAdmin/updateRole) and related profile setup modal.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal: no backend/canister changes required; BuildRequest does not request new admin role-management features or profile setup flows.
